name: Name
RoomUnavailableException: The selected room is unavailable during the chosen timeslot
ParticipantsExceedRoomCapacityException: The maximum number of participants exceeds the capacity of the selected room
SessionCanNotBeInThePastException: You can not create a session in the past
SessionTooShortException: A session must at least be 15 minutes long
SessionStartTimeBeforeSessionEndtimeExce: The session must end after it has started
CapacityCanNotBeSmallerThanAmountOfParti: The capacity of the session can not be smaller than the amount of registered users for this session, please remove users from this session before being able to perform this action.
CanotNotSignUpForTakenMatException: This mat has already been taken
CanNotReduceCapacityIfRoomIsPlannedForUp: You can not reduce the capacity of this room because it is being used in an upcoming session, please edit the room of the session before performing this action
CanNotDeleteRoomIfRoomIsPlannedForUpcomi: You can not delete this room because it is being used in an upcoming session, please edit the room of the session before performing this action
FailedToFetchUpcomingSessions: An unexpected error occured while trying to fetch the upcoming sessions, please try again later..
